message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $11500 for this valuable item.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product and the current market conditions, I am unable to accept your offer at $10000. My counteroffer is $11800. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $11800 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $10500. Can you consider this offer?

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product at $11600. This price reflects the quality and value of the item while remaining competitive within the market.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $10200. Can you consider this offer?
Considering the value of the product and the discussions we've had, I am willing to offer the product at $11400. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not willing to go above $10000. I'm willing to meet you at $9990, which is the absolute maximum I can go. Please consider this final offer.
After thorough consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $11300. I hope this proposal is acceptable and allows us to move forward.
